name: Rogue Ninja - Roguelike RPG
description:
### Rogue like Role Playing Game! ###
*Random Dungeons!
*Many items and monsters!
*Retro style pixel art and chiptune music!
*Japanese Ninja world!


### Reviews! ###
"And from the very beginning you ’ll appreciate Rogue Ninja ’s painstaking efforts to resemble that of an adventure of the 8-bit age , rife with brilliant hues , quirky character sprites , and sprawling dungeons ." - SlideToPlay
